metadata.name: Aredia 30 mg 10mL Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Pamidronate is indicated to treat moderate to severe hypercalcemia of malignancy moderate to severe Paget s disease of bone osteolytic bone metastases of breast cancer and osteolytic lesions of multiple myeloma L13838

contraindications.disease: Patients experiencing and overdose may present with hypocalcemia fever hypotension and taste perversion L13838 Overdose can be managed by symptomatic and supportive treatment which may include the administration of steroids and intravenous calcium L13838
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Pamidronic acid is a second generation nitrogen containing bisphosphonate that inhibits osteoclast mediated bone loss A203111 A959 L13838 It has a wide therapeutic index and a long duration of action as it can be given every 3 4 weeks for certain indications L13838 Patients should be counselled regarding the risk of elevated blood urea nitrogen renal tubular necrosis and nephrotoxicity L13838
